amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, an additional $2,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation, Air Force, for the Advanced Aluminum Aerostructures Initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4275 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4275 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To provide, with an offset, an additional $2,000,000 for research, development, test, and evaluation, Air Force, for the Advanced Aluminum Aerostructures Initiative.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4275 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Santorum.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4275 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
